content:
Just a shameless request. I’m at DevDays in Redmond and hoping for a little help with a very simple SMART EHR-based launch. Have been banging my head against the wall and I feel like I’m missing something very obvious.

Can get things working on SMART launchpad and HSPC but not Epic app orchard.

Thanks in advance.
Hey @Ben Orwoll ! I should be able to help you with this. Want to PM me tomorrow to find a time?
